meanings.definition: The quality or state of being disgraceful.
meanings.sent1: Her disgracefulnesses were evident to everyone at the party.
meanings.sent2: The disgracefulnesses of his actions were shocking to the entire community.
meanings.sent3: Despite her best efforts, her disgracefulnesses always seemed to surface at the worst times.
meanings.sent4: The shadow of disgracefulnesses followed him wherever he went.
meanings.sent5: The vivid memory of her disgracefulnesses lingered in his mind.

meanings.definition: The act or instance of causing shame or dishonor.
meanings.sent1: The public scandal caused great disgracefulnesses for the company.
meanings.sent2: His deceitful behavior led to the disgracefulnesses of his family name.
meanings.sent3: The comedy of errors resulted in a series of disgracefulnesses that left everyone laughing.
meanings.sent4: The weight of his disgracefulnesses felt like a heavy burden on his shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The vivid image of his disgracefulnesses was etched in the minds of all who witnessed it.
